tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Complaints (
    complaint_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_name VARCHAR(255),
    complaint_description TEXT,
    complaint_date DATE
)
CREATE TABLE passengers ( passenger_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), complaint TEXT, feedback TEXT );
CREATE TABLE staff ( staff_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), department VARCHAR(255), response TEXT );

CREATE TABLE complaints (
    complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_name VARCHAR(50),
    complaint_type VARCHAR(50),
    complaint_details TEXT
)
